headline: The Good-Enough Candidacy
abstract: He doesn’t want a revolution. He doesn’t have a movement. He could still win this thing.
lead_paragraph: Joe Biden has no trouble lingering in place, wherever he is, especially if there’s a point he wants to finish — or start. Generally it does not matter how many people are prodding him along or waiting out in the cold. And it seemed important to Biden that I hear what he was talking about right now before we finished.
